How it works

A beautiful, streamlined email experience

A clean interface that automatically trims long messages while filtering newsletters and social updates. It's still your inbox, but byte size.

Combine the speed of instant messaging with the power of email

Real-time messaging lets you easily engage with others. Share photos and hold group chats on the go, all backed up by your inbox.

Turn email into a truly powerful social networking tool

An intelligent contact management system that helps you network based on your email history. Send a Wave and get the attention of potential new connections.
